quest.name: He Who Waited Behind
journal: Father Iliud has some parting words for you and the others.

Father Iliud suggests that you begin your search for Cid's airship in Fallgourd Float, located in Gridania's North Shroud. Journey to the settlement and speak with the Twin Adder forces stationed there for more information.

The final flight of the Enterprise appears to be a well-known moment in Gridanian history, as Aethelmaer has no trouble recounting the event. He bids you speak with Vortefaurt at Florentel's Spire, a sentry who saw the airship with his own eyes that day five years ago.

Vortefaurt confirms that he bore witness to the vessel's passing. Listen well as the veteran Wailer spins his yarn, for it shall doubtless provide essential information that leads you to the errant vessel's location.
objectives: Speak with Aethelmaer in Fallgourd Float.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: What a curious twist of fate that Master Cid Garlond would at last be found within our church. It defies imagination...

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: Beg your pardon, Forename. You wish to find his airship, yes?

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: I know not how much truth there is to it, but there is a tale known as, “The Final Flight of the Enterprise,” which grew popular in the wake of the Calamity─much like “The Great Goobbue Wall of Ul'dah.” It states that the Enterprise flew northwest from Gridania towards Coerthas.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: If true, the airship would have passed through the North Shroud, likely over Fallgourd Float─the closest settlement to Coerthas. Mayhap the Serpents stationed there have records of the events that transpired that day.

dialogue.name: ILIUD
dialogue.text: I had hoped you might rest from your journeys for a time, but I see that the world still has need of you and the Scions. Pray look after yourself and Cid, Forename.

dialogue.name: AETHELMAER
dialogue.text: Is there aught I can assist you with, misssir?

dialogue.name: AETHELMAER
dialogue.text: The Enterprise? You speak of Master Garlond's ship, yes?

dialogue.name: AETHELMAER
dialogue.text: Aye, I needn't refer to the records. I know that the airship was sighted overhead five years ago, clearly bound for Coerthas. What became of it after that I cannot say.

dialogue.name: AETHELMAER
dialogue.text: If you wish to know more, pray speak with Vortefaurt at Florentel's Spire. He was on duty that day and saw it with his own eyes.

dialogue.name: AETHELMAER
dialogue.text: I am unsure what it is you hope to accomplish, though. Even should you locate the ship, would you not need a man of Master Garlond's caliber to fly it? I hear tell that the machinery is fiendishly complex...

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: You have come in search of Vortefaurt? Then well met, for you have found him.

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: Indeed, I have served as a Wailer for many years, since before the great snows came to Coerthas. What exactly is this about?

dialogue.name: VORTEFAURT
dialogue.text: Ahhh, the final flight of the Enterprise. I do indeed remember that day...
